Product overview

BARON is a computational system for solving nonconvex optimization problems to global optimality. Purely continuous, purely integer, and mixed-integer nonlinear problems can be solved with the software. The theory and algorithms implemented in the BARON software are the result of over two decades of academic research.

BARON provides:

  • A general purpose solver for mixed-integer nonlinear optimization problems.

  • Availability under the widely used AIMMS , AMPL and GAMS modeling languages.

  • Availability under MATLAB and YALMIP.

  • Developer-oriented parser interface that facilitates custom applications.

  • Software manual and demos are available for download.

 

 

The MATLAB/BARON interfarce is provided from http://www.minlp.com.
